prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that looks like a ladybug with an impressive shell.
Imagine a colorful insect Pokemon with vibrant patterns and unique features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both bugs and technology for a futuristic look.
Generate a whimsical creature that can camouflage in its forest habitat.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a flying insect with an awesome design.
Design a Pokemon that has both beauty and strength in its appearance.
I want to see a Pokemon that blends nature and technology seamlessly.

distinctive_features: Large blue spots on the shell
